H0.text: Lab apron and goggles are the most important safety gear to wear when working near an open flame.

H1.text: Sunglasses and thermal gloves are the most important safety gear to wear when working near an open flame.

H2.text: Rubber shoes and sunglasses are the most important safety gear to wear when working near an open flame.

H3.text: Thermal gloves and goggles are the most important safety gear to wear when working near an open flame.

A4.text: Correct eye protection should be worn in most experiments involving glassware.
